Key.English: The Rifleman is a flexible role, with access to a variety of kit to match the situation they find themselves in.
The Medic is responsible for keeping his squad in the fight through treating and reviving his squad mates.
The Engineer is responsible for keeping vehicles operational through repairing and maintaining them.
The Team Leader takes command of a small team in the field.
The Squad Leader takes command of an infantry squad, utilising all members to achieve the objectives.
The Explosive Specialist can track and defuse explosives, as well as setup explosives to aid his team.
The Sniper has access to long range weaponry and ghillie suits to assist friendlies from afar.
The Spotter aids the Sniper by choosing targets and acting as close protection.
The Pilot is responsible for transporting troops, vehicles and supplies around the AO. They can also fly CAS Missions to assist friendlies on the ground.
The UAV Operator can command UAV's and UGV's to assist friendly forces.
The Paratrooper supports his allies by using his ability do deploy from above to get into positions that regular infantry cannot.
The Diver is a specialist who comes equipped for underwater operations.
The Crewman takes control of vehicles to support friendly forces.
The Officer is in overall command of all forces to achieve their objectives.
